skillTree.localised_description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.
Among the enemy before the battle is even joined.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: Only Loec’s chosen can disappear while in plain sight.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: The Shadowdancers are the only Asrai who know all paths through Athel Loren.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The Trickster God smiles as his followers outwit their opponents.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
How can you prevail when you cannot trust your senses?

target_if: Not on or below a platform

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Shoot her! SHOOT HER!
All Asrai respect and fear Loec’s ‘priests’.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: Loec has guided many actions from the shadows.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
They know the ambush is coming, they just don’t know from where.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(own armies in region)

target_if: Not on or below a platform

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Firing wildly into the darkness is hardly a winning strategy.
With a smile and a wink, the Shadowdancer subverts.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: +8%
	(enemy armies in province)

target_if: Not on or below a platform

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Through some bargain or trick, Loec has directed Hoeth to protect his follower.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.
Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 4
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A mesmerizing dance of blades and flowing garments, a shadowdancer can cut entire squadrons to pieces before any have had a chance to strike back.
